parameters.name: FeatMgrViewPane
parameters.description: FeatureManager design tree view as defined by swFeatMgrPane_e

title: IModelViewManager.GetFeatureMgrViewHWndx64
description: Gets the window handle for the specified FeatureManager design tree view in 64-bit applications.

parameters.name: FeatMgrViewPane
parameters.description: FeatureManager design tree view as defined by swFeatMgrPane_e

returns: Window handle for the specified FeatMgrViewPane
remarks: This method is only available through early binding and with 64-bit versions of the SOLIDWORKS Design software.
